name: lekkada-book-api
description: ![image](https://github.com/shridhargovindaiah/lekkada-book-api/assets/20173538/22a9b69a-c7ab-41c4-9ffd-df305a7b21e0) Lekkada Book or Lekkada Pushtaka is Kannada word for Account Book. As the name suggests, this is a straightforward app that helps you to keep your spending (Lekka).
